String.string: Ask {@LinkCreature:248#1032#Hazto} at {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel} about collecting the components.
You see a soldier fighting the argons!
Investigate the area where the cannons attacked at {@Rgn:48006$$Carnage Vale}.
Ask {@LinkCreature:48#1012#Greldam} why he is left alone.
Grab the insignia and the chapter.
Retrieve the insignia from the {@linkcreature:248#1028#body} in {@Rgn:48006}.
Tell {@LinkCreature:48#1012#Greldam} that you've retrieved the insignia from {@Rgn:48006}.
Kill argon shapers around {@Rgn:48006} and collect a component from one of the sarjalod cannons.
Deliver the insignias and components to {@LinkCreature:248#1032#Hazto} in {@Rgn:48002}.
